_header: I love so sore I would fain discern
_description: The three leaves of true love, according to a woman — eighth stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawC813.First Lines:
I loue So Sore I wolde fayne descerneyf þat I coude what loue
                    myght be…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…Thys stydfastnes ys mastur and rules all þe levesfor
                    loue wuth owt stydfastnes no thyng avayles
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.” 
             Anglia
         31 (1908): 309-96: 381-2.
Jansen,  Sharon L.,  and  Kathleen H. Jordan, eds.  
             The Welles Anthology: MS. Rawlinson C.813: A Critical Edition.
         Binghamton, NY: Medieval & Renaissance Texts and Studies,
            1991: 228-30.
